New Records: Blazers rookie Donovan Clingan scored 17 points on 6-for-10 shooting, adding 12 rebounds, one assist, and a career-high eight blocks in over 30 minutes against the Timberwolves
Key Match Events: Donovan Clingan's pivotal performance was crucial in the Trail Blazers' victory over a stronger opponent in Anthony Edwards and the Minnesota Timberwolves
Miscellaneous Highlights: Donovan Clingan, drafted No. 7 overall, has been seen as a potential NBA contributor from the start, despite an initial slow start with the Trail Blazers
Others: Clingan's previous career-high performance of 13 points against the Grizzlies helped him secure a starting role, where he then excelled against the Timberwolves
